segments.text: Nowadays fewer and fewer people go to the movie theaters to see films . So I am afraid that the film studios are really getting hard time to survive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What you said is true . But the film producers there are more flexible ways to get more audience . For example , to make more movie Ccds , so people will spend money buying them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it is true that cinemas are losing the attraction they used to have in the past .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Take myself for example . I seldom go to cinemas , but it doesn't mean I no longer see films ; instead , I see films at home-watching Ccds .
segments.speaker: S2
